Function Documentation

PIZ_LOCAL PIZNote* pizSequenceAddNote ( PIZSequence *  x,
long *  values,
long  flags 
)

Add a note to the sequence.

The size of the array must be PIZ_DATA_NOTE_SIZE.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
values A pointer to note values.
flags The flags (as ORed PIZAddFlag).
Returns:
A pointer to the new note, NULL in case of error.
Warning:
For efficiency array size is NOT checked ; so crash may occured with invalid size.

Definition at line 915 of file pizSequence.c.

PIZ_LOCAL void pizSequenceMakeMap ( PIZSequence *  x  ) 

Restore the map after notes have been created, deleted or moved.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
Remarks:
For efficiency a list of linked lists currently used is stored in an array ; this function MUST be called to rebuild the list after modifications on note positions.

PIZ_LOCAL void pizSequenceFillValues ( PIZSequence *  x,
PIZSelector  selector,
long  k,
bool  reverse 
)

Fill sequence's notes from a private values array with a private PIZNote pointers array.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
selector A selector to set the MIDI data type concerned as PIZSelector.
k The size of arrays.
reverse Array is traversed in reverse mode if true.
